title: [求助]在eclipse中测试mod时minecraft闪退
author: 死亡叹息
txt_content:
我在使用eclipse测试自己的mod时，minecraft一直闪退。一下是错误信息以及一些提供信息的图片，包括我的mod的所有代码和jdk,jre版本，希望有人予以解答。[12:06:02] [main/INFO] [GradleStart]: Extra: [] [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [GradleStart]: Running with arguments: [--userProperties, {}, --assetsDir, C:/Users/Destiny/.gradle/caches/minecraft/assets, --assetIndex, 1.7.10, --accessToken, {REDACTED}, --version, 1.7.10, --tweakClass, cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker, --tweakClass, net.minecraftforge.gradle.tweakers.CoremodTweaker] [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name net.minecraftforge.gradle.tweakers.CoremodTweaker [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [FML]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.99.40.1614 for Minecraft 1.7.10 loading [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [FML]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_211, running on Windows 10:amd64:10.0, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_211 [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [FML]: Managed to load a deobfuscated Minecraft name- we are in a deobfuscated environment. Skipping runtime deobfuscation [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class net.minecraftforge.gradle.tweakers.CoremodTweaker [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [GradleStart]: Injecting location in coremod cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLCorePlugin [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [GradleStart]: Injecting location in coremod net.minecraftforge.classloading.FMLForgePlugin [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name net.minecraftforge.gradle.tweakers.AccessTransformerTweaker [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker [12:06:02] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager$FMLPluginWrapper [12:06:03] [main/ERROR] [FML]: The binary patch set is missing. Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release
复制代码以及客户端配置文件：ClientProxy.javapackage com.destiny.witch; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLInitializationEvent; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLPostInitializationEvent; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLPreInitializationEvent; public class ClientProxy extends CommonProxy{ public void preInit(FMLPreInitializationEvent e){ super.preInit(e); } public void Init(FMLInitializationEvent e){ super.Init(e); } public void postInit(FMLPostInitializationEvent e){ super.postInit(e); } }复制代码 以下是服务端配置文件:ServerProxy.javapackage com.destiny.witch; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLInitializationEvent; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLPostInitializationEvent; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLPreInitializationEvent; public class ServerProxy extends CommonProxy{ public void preInit(FMLPreInitializationEvent e){ super.preInit(e); } public void Init(FMLInitializationEvent e){ super.Init(e); } public void postInit(FMLPostInitializationEvent e){ super.postInit(e); } } 复制代码 以及通用配置文件CommonProxy.javapackage com.destiny.witch; import com.destiny.witch.item.ModItems; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLInitializationEvent; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLPostInitializationEvent; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLPreInitializationEvent; public class CommonProxy{ public void preInit(FMLPreInitializationEvent e){         ModItems.init(); } public void Init(FMLInitializationEvent e){ } public void postInit(FMLPostInitializationEvent e){ } }复制代码 一下是Main.javapackage com.destiny.witch; import cpw.mods.fml.common.Mod; import cpw.mods.fml.common.Mod.EventHandler; import cpw.mods.fml.common.Mod.Instance; import cpw.mods.fml.common.SidedProxy; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLInitializationEvent; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLPostInitializationEvent; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLPreInitializationEvent; @Mod(modid=Main.MODID,name=Main.MODNAME,version=Main.VERSION) public class Main{ @SidedProxy(clientSide="com.destiny.witch.ClientProxy",serverSide="com.destiny.witch.ServerProxy") CommonProxy proxy=new CommonProxy(); public final static String MODID="firstmod"; public final static String MODNAME="Amethyst Mod"; public final static String VERSION="1.0.0"; @Instance public static Main instance=new Main(); @EventHandler public void preInit(FMLPreInitializationEvent e){         this.proxy.preInit(e); } @EventHandler public void Init(FMLInitializationEvent e){         this.proxy.Init(e); } @EventHandler public void postInit(FMLPostInitializationEvent e){         this.proxy.postInit(e); } }复制代码 mod物品配置文件ModItems.javapackage com.destiny.witch; import cpw.mods.fml.common.Mod; import cpw.mods.fml.common.Mod.EventHandler; import cpw.mods.fml.common.Mod.Instance; import cpw.mods.fml.common.SidedProxy; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLInitializationEvent; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLPostInitializationEvent; import cpw.mods.fml.common.event.FMLPreInitializationEvent; @Mod(modid=Main.MODID,name=Main.MODNAME,version=Main.VERSION) public class Main{ @SidedProxy(clientSide="com.destiny.witch.ClientProxy",serverSide="com.destiny.witch.ServerProxy") CommonProxy proxy=new CommonProxy(); public final static String MODID="firstmod"; public final static String MODNAME="Amethyst Mod"; public final static String VERSION="1.0.0"; @Instance public static Main instance=new Main(); @EventHandler public void preInit(FMLPreInitializationEvent e){         this.proxy.preInit(e); } @EventHandler public void Init(FMLInitializationEvent e){         this.proxy.Init(e); } @EventHandler public void postInit(FMLPostInitializationEvent e){         this.proxy.postInit(e); } }复制代码 以及我个人定义的rein.javapackage com.destiny.witch.item; import net.minecraft.creativetab.CreativeTabs; import net.minecraft.item.Item; public class rein extends Item{ public rein(){ setUnlocalizedName("rein"); setCreativeTab(CreativeTabs.tabMaterials); } }复制代码 java窗口.PNG (106.08 KB, 下载次数: 0) 下载附件 2019-6-13 12:22 上传 JAVA_HOME.PNG (35.5 KB, 下载次数: 0) 下载附件 2019-6-13 12:23 上传 配置.PNG (178.69 KB, 下载次数: 0) 下载附件 2019-6-13 12:24 上传
